actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production, Marketing, and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to make deficiency payments for the 1986 crops of wheat and feed grains not later than the end of the fifth month of the marketing years for such crops.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to make 1986 wheat and feed grain deficiency payments not later than the end of the fifth month of the marketing year for such crops.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to make deficiency payments for the 1986 crops of wheat and feed grains not later than the end of the fifth month of the marketing years for such crops.
